title: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development - Wikipedia
snippet: Representatives from each member state compose this board, they have authority power. Currently (2024-2025) Slovenia is the Chair of Board of Governors, while Iceland and Turkey are the Vice Chairs.

title: Directors of the EBRD
snippet: Matteo Patrone is the Vice President, Banking.

title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: Learn about the EBRD's journey to investing more than €210 billion in over 7,500 projects · Through projects, business services and involvement in high-level policy reform, we're doing more than ever before

title: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD)
snippet: Join us on Tuesday 25 November 2025 at 16.00 (London time) for the launch of the Transition Report 2025-26 in the Auditorium at Five Bank Street, London E14 4BG.
